# Technical part

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(mediumstats)
```

# Get labels

Retrieve the list of blog labels:

```{r rss}
labels <- labels_archive

# It is advisable to run update_labels_archive() every now and then.
# This updates labels_archive with the latest information from the feed.
#
# labels_archive is shipped as data with the package itself, so it is
# advisable to push the changes after a local update succeeds.
```

## Read statistics

```{r stats}
#stats <- get_mes_stats('../data/mes.csv') # With Medium enhanced stats
stats <- get_msg_stats('../data/msg.csv') # With Medium stats grabber
```

## Combine labels and statistics

```{r merge}
stats_no_title <- subset(stats, select = -c(title)) # Avoid duplicated titles
merge(labels, stats_no_title, by = 'id', all = TRUE)
```
